tables.name: evm_blocks
tables.description: This table (evm_blocks) stores information about each block in the Cosmos ecosystem's blockchain. It provides data on the block number, creation time, and unique identifier.

columns.name: height
columns.description: Sequential block number identifier in the blockchain

columns.name: timestamp
columns.description: ISO 8601 datetime value representing block creation time

columns.name: hash
columns.description: Unique cryptographic hash of the block header

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: ISO 8601 datetime value representing data ingestion time

tables.name: evm_logs
tables.description: EVM logs table containing data from Cosmos ecosystem blockchains. This table stores events related to transactions executed on these blockchains.

columns.name: address
columns.description: EVM transaction or smart contract account address

columns.name: data
columns.description: EVM smart contract execution data in hexadecimal format

columns.name: block_hash
columns.description: Hash of the EVM block associated with the log event

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: Index of the log within the EVM block

columns.name: transaction_hash_evm
columns.description: Hash of the EVM transaction for the log event

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the log data was ingested

columns.name: topics
columns.description: EVM log event topics for filtering and sorting purposes

tables.name: evm_tokens_sales
tables.description: This table provides insights into token sales events across the Cosmos ecosystem, covering blockchain sales data. It helps track the transactions and marketplaces involved in these events.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Identifier for blockchain block, representing the sequence of transactions

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the blockchain block was created or finalized

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique hash identifying a transaction on the blockchain

columns.name: tx_hash_evm
columns.description: Unique hash of EVM-compatible transaction on blockchain

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: Index of log or event within a EVM-compatible transaction

columns.name: marketplace
columns.description: DAI marketplace or exchange platform on blockchain

columns.name: from
columns.description: Blockchain address of transaction sender or originator

columns.name: to
columns.description: Blockchain address of transaction recipient or contract

columns.name: token_address
columns.description: Smart contract address for ERC-20 or EVM-compatible tokens

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was imported into the database

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Earliest block height of a transaction in the blockchain sequence

columns.name: hash
columns.description: Unique transaction identifier in the blockchain network

columns.name: hash_evm
columns.description: EVM transaction hash, when the transaction originates from EVM

columns.name: evm_index
columns.description: Index of EVM transaction in the transaction list

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Amount of gas consumed by a transaction during execution

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Transaction amount, representing value transferred in coin units

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Blockchain address that initiated the transaction

columns.name: evm_sender
columns.description: EVM sender address, used when transaction originates from EVM

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: Blockchain address that received the transaction value

columns.name: code
columns.description: Location or source address of contract code deployment

columns.name: data
columns.description: Related contract data and/or call data for specific transaction

columns.name: index
columns.description: Transaction index in the blockchain block

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: Maximum gas that a transaction is allowed to consume

columns.name: tx_json
columns.description: Raw transaction JSON object containing additional transaction details

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when transaction data was ingested into the system

columns.name: MsgEthereumTx
columns.description: Original MsgEthereumTx formatting from transaction data

columns.name: LegacyTx
columns.description: Original LegacyTx formatting from transaction data

columns.name: AccessListTx
columns.description: Original AccessListTx formatting from transaction data

columns.name: DynamicFeeTx
columns.description: Original DynamicFeeTx formatting from transaction data

columns.name: raw_data
columns.description: Raw processed transaction data, excluding processed formatters

columns.name: TxRaw
columns.description: Raw transaction data without processing or formatting modifications

columns.name: gas_price
columns.description: Gas price at the time the transaction was processed

tables.name: evm_transfer_event
tables.description: The EVM Transfer Event table represents a collection of transfer events occurring on the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem, documenting token transactions between accounts. This data is crucial for analyzing token activity and understanding the behavior of participants in the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the blockchain block

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the blockchain block was created or proposed

columns.name: tx_hash_evm
columns.description: Unique hash of the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) transaction

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique hash of the Cosmos native transaction

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: Index of the smart contract event or log within the transaction

columns.name: token_address
columns.description: Address of the token being transferred or interacted with

columns.name: from
columns.description: EVM address or account performing the transfer or interaction

columns.name: to
columns.description: EVM address or account receiving the transaction or interaction

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Quantity of cryptocurrency or tokens transferred or interacted with

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: evm_transfer_single_event
tables.description: This table contains detailed information about transfers of tokens within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the characteristics of these transactions. Each entry represents a single transfer operation.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Ascending block identifier in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of block in the blockchain network

columns.name: tx_hash_evm
columns.description: Unique identifier for Ethereum Virtual Machine transaction

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique identifier for blockchain transaction

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: Index of log within a transaction in a contract call

columns.name: token_address
columns.description: Address of token or asset account in the blockchain

columns.name: operator
columns.description: Agent or contract executing transaction on behalf of user

columns.name: from
columns.description: Source address or account originating transaction

columns.name: to
columns.description: Destination address or account receiving transaction

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for transaction or event within a block

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Quantity of token or asset transferred in transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested into the system

tables.name: evm_uniswap_v2_dex_swaps
tables.description: This table contains a detailed summary of decentralized exchange (DEX) swaps executed on Uniswap v2 DEX within the Cosmos network ecosystem. The data is sourced from blockchain events, offering valuable insights into token transfers and swaps between various Cosmos- based blockchains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The sequential height of a block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when a block was created in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_hash_evm
columns.description: The hash of an Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) transaction

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The hash of a transaction in the Cosmos blockchain

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the entity sending a transaction or funds

columns.name: evm_sender
columns.description: The sender's address in the Ethereum Virtual Machine context

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: The index of a log within a single transaction's logs

columns.name: pair
columns.description: A unique identifier for the pair of tokens being swapped

columns.name: dex_router
columns.description: The contract or address acting as a decentralized exchange router

columns.name: to
columns.description: The recipient of funds or tokens in a transaction

columns.name: amount_0_in
columns.description: The amount of the first token being received in a swap

columns.name: amount_1_in
columns.description: The amount of the second token being received in a swap

columns.name: amount_0_out
columns.description: The amount of the first token being sent out in a swap

columns.name: amount_1_out
columns.description: The amount of the second token being sent out in a swap

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: evmos_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blocks Table: This table provides information about blocks created in the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains details such as block height and timestamp, validators, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifier for each block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when the block was created in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Idenifier for the specific blockchain network within the Cosmos ecosystem

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: Address of the validator responsible for proposing the block

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: Hash representing the consensus state of the validators at the time

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block data was ingested into the database

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: Total size of the messages included in the block in bytes

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: Total number of transactions included in the block

tables.name: evmos_convert_ERC20
tables.description: This table tracks transactions where ERC-20 tokens are being converted or swapped to Cosmos native coins. The data is sourced from the Cosmos ecosystem blockchains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Identifier for current block in the Ethereum Virtual Machine EVM

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of block when data was inserted into the blockchain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Identifier for a transaction, uniquely linking it to a block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index or order of a message within a transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Ordinal position of a specific action in a transaction

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Wallet address sending funds or triggering a transaction

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: Wallet address receiving funds or affected by a transaction

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Quantified amount transferred or affected by a transaction

columns.name: erc20_token
columns.description: Token identifier on the ERC-20 standard for a specific asset

columns.name: cosmos_coin
columns.description: Identifier for an asset obtained or used within a Cosmos ecosystem

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested into our dataset

tables.name: evmos_convert_coin
tables.description: This table captures transactions related to token conversions in the Cosmos ecosystem, where tokens can be exchanged or swapped between different assets.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of a block within the blockchain, indicating its position in the chain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created and added to the blockchain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction within a blockchain network

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of a smart contract message or IBC packet within a transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Index of a specific action or IBC packet within a transaction

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account initiating a transaction or sending funds

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: Address of the account receiving funds or services

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Value of assets or tokens transferred during a transaction

columns.name: cosmos_coin
columns.description: Quantity of Cosmos-based tokens transacted, such as ATOM

columns.name: erc20_token
columns.description: Quantity of ERC-20 tokens managed within the EVMOS network

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transactional data was ingested into the database

tables.name: evmos_delegate
tables.description: Cosmos Delegatefuscation event monitoring table. This table provides an overview of changes to the state of Cosmos validators and their stakeholders, providing valuable insights into the dynamic workings of the Cosmos network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequential number assigned to the block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block's creation in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Transaction identifier within the specified blockchain network

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Index of the action or message within a transaction

columns.name: validator
columns.description: ár actions performed by a validator within the blockchain

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Moniker of the validator for easy identification

columns.name: delegator
columns.description: ár account performing a delegation action within the network

columns.name: parsed_EVMOS_amount
columns.description: Formatted amount of EVMOS being transferred or staked

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: Updated shares for the delegator following the staking action

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the ingestion of this data into the system

tables.name: evmos_developer_revenue
tables.description: This datasource provides insights into the developer revenue from the Cosmos ecosystem, comprising data from various blockchains. The data is extracted directly from the blockchain, offering a granular view of developer earnings.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifier for a block in the blockchain sequence

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Time at which a block was included in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction within the blockchain

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of a message within a transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Index of a specific action within a transaction

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Identifier of the blockchain account initiating a transaction

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Quantity of tokens transferred in a transaction

columns.name: amount_in_usdc
columns.description: Amount in USDC equivalent for token transfers

columns.name: contract
columns.description: Identifier of a blockchain-enabled smart contract

columns.name: withdraw_address
columns.description: Account address receiving withdrawn funds

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Time when this data was ingested into the database

tables.name: evmos_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains various attributes of events from the cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into the transaction and block-level data.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of a block in the blockchain, typically an integer.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Uniquely identifies a blockchain, typically a string or integer.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hash of a blockchain transaction, provides transaction uniqueness.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index of a transaction event within a transaction.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event occurring on the blockchain, an enumeration.

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: Module or smart contract responsible for generating an event.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Key describing metadata associated with a blockchain event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Value of metadata associated with a blockchain event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Index of an attribute within the event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when data was ingested into the dataset.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when a block was finalized in the blockchain.

tables.name: evmos_ibc_receive
tables.description: This table tracks IBC (Inter- Blockchain Communication) receive transactions across the Cosmos ecosystem, enabling users to visualize and analyze IBC transfers.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequential block number on a blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when a block was created or created

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a single blockchain transaction

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Ordinal position of a message within a transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Ordinal position of an action within a transaction

columns.name: packet_src_channel
columns.description: Source channel identifier in an IBC packet

columns.name: packet_dts_channel
columns.description: Destination channel identifier in an IBC packet

columns.name: packet_connection
columns.description: Identifier for a connection in a packet

columns.name: packet_sequence
columns.description: Sequence number within a packet

columns.name: packet_ack
columns.description: Acknowledgement status of a packet

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account initiating a transaction

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: Address of the account receiving a transaction

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Quantitative value of a token transfer

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: Path through which tokens were transferred

columns.name: token_alias
columns.description: Common name for a token

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination or unit of a token

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Optional descriptive note accompanying a transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the EVMOS

tables.name: evmos_ibc_transfer
tables.description: This table contains information about Cosmos IBC (Inter- Blockchain Communication) token transfers between different blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem. The data provides a detailed overview of the transactions, channels, and token movements across the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the blockchain block containing this transaction

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the blockchain block was proposed to the network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hash identifying a unique transaction in the blockchain

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Ordinal position of a specific action within a transaction

columns.name: packet_src_channel
columns.description: Source channel identifier for an IBC packet

columns.name: packet_dts_channel
columns.description: Destination channel identifier for an IBC packet

columns.name: packet_connection
columns.description: Identifier for an IBC connection

columns.name: packet_sequence
columns.description: Sequence number for an IBC packet

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the sender for a transaction

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: Address of the recipient for a transaction

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Quantity of token being transferred

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: Route of token transfer between chains (if applicable)

columns.name: token_alias
columns.description: Alias or symbol of the token being transferred

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Optional comment associated with a transaction

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Token denomination or unit being transferred

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: evmos_ibc_transfer_delays
tables.description: This table tracks IBC transfer delays within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the timelines of transaction approvals and network congestion.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the inter-blockchain communication (IBC) transaction

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block where the IBC transaction was included

columns.name: ack_block_height
columns.description: Height of the block where the IBC transaction acknowledgment occurred

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the sender initiating the IBC transaction

columns.name: tx_delay
columns.description: Time elapsed between the tx creation and execution on the target chain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block where the IBC transaction was executed

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block data was ingested into the dataset

tables.name: evmos_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains a detailed view of blockchain events in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing attributes about each event occurrence. The attributes are gathered from a variety of blockchain sources.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: EVMOS block number sequence, incremented for each new block

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier differentiating the EVMOS network from others

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique hash identifier for a transaction on the EVMOS network

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of a message within a transaction on the EVMOS network

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index of an event within a message on the EVMOS network

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Category of event (e.g. transaction, block, governance, IBC, etc.)

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Key for an attribute associated with an event on the EVMOS network

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Value of an attribute associated with an event on the EVMOS network

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Index of an attribute within an event on the EVMOS network

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Time when the event data was ingested or processed

tables.name: evmos_message_types_transactions
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive view of transactional activities within the Cosmos ecosystem, covering key information about blocks, transactions, and messages. It offers insights into the sender-side interactions within the blockchain network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Numeric identifier of the blockchain block's position in the chain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Time at which the blockchain block was created in seconds since Unix epoch

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to a transaction within the blockchain

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index representing the position of the transaction's message within its tx

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Identifier of a specific action within a transaction's message (if applicable)

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Identifier of the entity that initiated the transaction's message

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: Category or type of the transaction's message (e.g. IBC, governance, etc.)

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Time at which the transaction's message was ingested into the data set

tables.name: evmos_redelegate
tables.description: Redelegation events in the Cosmos ecosystem track the transfer of validator delegations between validators, allowing for delegation rebalancing and optimizing staking efficiency. These records provide a historical view of validator delegations and transfers.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifying number of each block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when each block was added to the blockchain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique transaction identifier within the blockchain network

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Sequential order of messages within a transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Index of action (e.g., transfer, balance) within a message

columns.name: source_validator
columns.description: Public address of the validator initiating the redelegate

columns.name: source_moniker
columns.description: Moniker/alias of the validator initiating the redelegate

columns.name: destination_validator
columns.description: Public address of the validator receiving the redelegate

columns.name: destination_moniker
columns.description: Moniker/alias of the validator receiving the redelegate

columns.name: delegator
columns.description: Public address of the delegator reassigning their stake

columns.name: evmos_amount
columns.description: Amount of EVMOS tokens transferred in the redelegate

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the redelegate transaction completed

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: evmos_sends
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Transactions - Overview of executed transactions, their timestamps, and token movements between accounts.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Identifier for a specific block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when a block was added to the blockchain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of a message within a transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Sequence number of a specific action in a transaction

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account that initiated a transaction

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: Address of the account that received tokens

columns.name: tokens_amount
columns.description: Quantity of tokens transferred

columns.name: tokens_denom
columns.description: Denomination of the transferred tokens

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested into the database

tables.name: evmos_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transaction information from the Cosmos ecosystem, including their status, fees, and associated block information. It provides a comprehensive view of interactions within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of a specific blockchain block

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the blockchain network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hash-based identifier for a transaction

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Detailed information about a transaction

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: Logs and events generated by a transaction

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Cost incurred by a sender for executing a transaction

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: Execution result of a transaction

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Position of a transaction within a block

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Total gas consumed by a transaction

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: Desired gas limit for transaction execution

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when transaction was ingested

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Optional note accompanying a transaction

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version of the transaction schema

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: Denomination and quantity of transaction fees

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: Account responsible for paying transaction fees

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: Account authorized to pay transaction fees

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: Upper gas limit for secure transaction execution

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Indicates single-signature transaction type

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: Serialized multi-signature transaction data

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: Block height after which transactions become invalid

tables.name: evmos_undelegate
tables.description: The Undelegate datasource tracks undelegation transactions in the Cosmos ecosystem. Undelegation transactions occur when a validator redelegates a portion of its staked tokens to another validator, increasing the token supply available to other validators.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in which the undelegation transaction was included

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block in which the undelegation transaction occurred

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique hexadecimal identifier of the transaction

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction message within the transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Ordinal position of the undelegation action within the transaction

columns.name: validator
columns.description: Address of the validator issuing the undelegation

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Display name of the validator issuing the undelegation

columns.name: delegator
columns.description: Address of the delegator who unstaked EVMOS

columns.name: parsed_EVMOS_amount
columns.description: Amount of EVMOS tokens unstaked from the delegator

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the undelegation was finalized

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the database

tables.name: evmos_validators
tables.description: Active Cosmos validators, a crucial component of the Cosmos Network, store and validate blocks ensuring the integrity and security of the chain. Their details are vital for users to choose a validator that suits their needs.

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: Cryptographic public key of a validator's Cosmos account

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: EVM-compatible address of the validator's operator

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: Validator's Ed25519 public key for consensus participation

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current operational status of a validator within the network

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Custom name chosen by the validator for identification purposes

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Validator's publicly accessible identity details

columns.name: rate
columns.description: Validator's maximum rate of reward claim in the network token

columns.name: max_rate
columns.description: Validator's maximum reward claim rate within the network

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: Minimum amount self-delegated by the validator to itself

columns.name: Network
columns.description: The blockchain network on which the validator is active

columns.name: Snapshot_date
columns.description: Date of the snapshot used to obtain validator data

columns.name: proposer_hashed_address
columns.description: Hashed address of the proposer in the validator set

tables.name: evmos_voting
tables.description: This table provides an overview of Cosmos ecosystem blockchain voting data, which is essential for understanding the consensus and decision-making processes within the network. The data includes transaction information, proposal statuses, and voter insights.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequential identifier for a block in the blockchain, indicating its position.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp for when a block was generated in the blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Uniquely identifying hash for a transaction within the blockchain.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of a transaction message within a specific transaction's payload.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Order of occurrence for a particular action within a transaction message.

columns.name: voter
columns.description: Address or account responsible for casting a vote in governance.

columns.name: proposal_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a governance proposal across the network.

columns.name: proposal_option
columns.description: Elected option or choice submitted for a governance proposal.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp indicating when the data was ingested or imported.

tables.name: evmos_withdraw_rewards
tables.description: This table contains records of withdrawals of rewards from validators in the Cosmos ecosystem, as processed by our ingestion service. It captures key events related to token transfers in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the blockchain block

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the blockchain block occurrence

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hash identifier of the blockchain transaction

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the specific message within a transaction

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: Identifier for the action executed in the transaction

columns.name: validator
columns.description: Address of the Ethereum validator participating in a consensus

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Display name or alias of the Ethereum validator

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: Address receiving the cryptocurrency or tokens within the transaction

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Quantity of cryptocurrency or tokens transferred or exchanged

columns.name: token_amount_in_usdc
columns.description: Equivalent USDC value of transferred or exchanged tokens

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination or unit of the cryptocurrency or tokens

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Time when the blockchain data was ingested and processed
